text: Chemistry is the study of matter, but I prefer to see it at the study of change
author: Walter White

text: Yeah Mr. White! Yeah science!
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: Fuck you! And your eyebrows!
author: Walter White

text: My name is Skyler White, yo
author: Skyler White

text: Yeah, totally Kafkaesque
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: Smoking marijuana, eating cheetos, and masturbating do not constitute plans in my book
author: Walter White

text: Big doings today. The order of the day is 'eyes open, mouth shut'
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

text: Oh, hey, nerdiest old dude I know, you wanna come cook crystal? Please. I’d ask my diaper-wearing granny, but her wheelchair wouldn’t fit in the RV
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: What I came to realize is that fear, that's the worst enemy. So, get up, get out in the real world and you kick that bastard as hard as you can right in the teeth
author: Walter White

text: Let's start with some tough love. You two suck at peddling meth. Period
author: Saul Goodman

text: I'm a blow fish! Yeah, Blow fishin' this up!
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: So you’re chasing around a fly and in your world I’m the idiot?
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: You are a wealthy man now. One must learn to be rich. To be poor, anyone can manage
author: Gustavo Fring

text: This my own private domicile, and I will not be harassed… bitch!
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: Someone has to protect this family, from the man that protects this family
author: Skyler White

text: I am not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger. A guy opens his door and gets shot, and you think that of me? No! I am the one who knocks!
author: Walter White

text: What if this is like math? Or algebra? You know, you add a plus douchebag to a minus douchebag, then you get, like, zero douchebags
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: It says, ‘To W.W., my star, my perfect silence.’ W.W., I mean, who do you figure that is? Woodrow Wilson? Willy Wonka? Walter White?
author: Hank Schrader

text: Can you walk? Then get the fuck outta here and never come back
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: Jesus Christ, Marie. They're minerals!
author: Hank Schrader

text: We're done when i say we're done
author: Walter White

text: You need to stop focusing on the darkness behind you. The past is the past, nothing can change what we've done
author: Walter White

text: Yeah, bitch! Magnets!
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: The next time you bring a gun to a job without telling me, I will stick it up your ass sideways
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

text: Don't drink and drive. But if you do, call me
author: Saul Goodman

text: Say my name
author: Walter White

text: Last I asked for your help, you said, 'I hope you end up buried in a barrel in the Mexican desert'
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: You think I came all this way, just to let something as silly as lung-cancer take me down? Not a chance!
author: Walter White

text: Everyone sounds like Meryl Streep with a gun to their head
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

text: When we do what we do for good reasons, then we’ve got nothing to worry about. And there’s no better reason... than family
author: Walter White

text: There's no honor among thieves... Except for us of course
author: Saul Goodman

text: Oh well, heil Hitler, bitch!
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: I'm waiting for the cancer to come back
author: Skyler White

text: I will kill your wife, I will kill your son, I will kill your infant daughter
author: Gustavo Fring

text: Yo-yo-yo 148, 3-to-the-3-to-the-6-to-the-9. Representin’ the ABQ. What up, biatch? Leave it at the tone!
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: Did you not plan for this contingency? I mean, the Starship Enterprise had a self-destruct button
author: Saul Goodman

text: You asked me if I was in the meth business or the money business. Neither. I am in the empire business
author: Walter White

text: I’m sorry the kid here doesn’t see it, but I sure as hell do. You are a time bomb. Tick tick ticking. And I have no intention for being around for the boom
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

text: You're my free pass.... Bitch!
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: I want NOTHING to do with you! Ever since I met you, everything I ever cared about is gone! Ruined, turned to shit, dead, ever since I hooked up with the great Heisenberg!
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it. And I was really... I was alive
author: Walter White

text: You're an insane, degenerate piece of filth, and you deserve to die
author: Walter White

text: You know how they say, 'It's been a pleasure?' It hasn't
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

text: If you don’t know who I am... then maybe your best course would be to tread lightly
author: Walter White

text: We make poison for people who don’t care. We probably have the most unpicky customers in the world
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: You don’t need a criminal lawyer. You need a CRIMINAL lawyer
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: Some people are immune to good advice
author: Saul Goodman

text: I watched Jane die. I was there. And I watched her die. I watched her overdose and choke to death. I could have saved her. But I didn’t
author: Walter White

text: I'm a dying man who runs a car-wash. My right hand to God... that is all that I am
author: Walter White

text: We’re all on the same page. The one that says, if I can’t kill you, you’ll sure as shit wish you were dead
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: What good is being an outlaw when you have responsibilities
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: You either run from things, or you face them, Mr. White
author: Jesse Pinkman
